content:
This car is parked at an odd angle...
Could it be... intentional...?

Those dramatic scratches on the car - that's definitely Suye's handiwork.
Oh wow! Guess they don't even go easy on their own ride.

The damage on this car is severe,
it seems to have been deliberately sabotaged...

This car, radiating enthusiasm like a sizzling wok of ginger, scallions, and garlic,
must definitely be Manna's car.

A rebellious heart deliberately pushing past boundaries...
Oh, it's Rebella's car.

"Huozhu Cart"?
How strange, why did I think of
such an odd name when I saw this vehicle...

Is this little car parked here
trying to give me a jump scare?

Who would've thought a car
could feel so cozy and homey?
Is this what having a professional color coordinator can do?

The car is parked in a rather peculiar way,
And there's a hot air balloon's tether ring on top.
Could this car have been... carried here by a balloon?

I suddenly want to take a nap inside,
The color of this car looks so cozy
